text: Oh, my God! - said the mouse. The world is getting smaller every day. At first, he was so big, I was afraid of him. I ran and ran and I was glad to see those walls, right and left, in the distance. But those walls are narrowing so fast that I'm in the last room and there in the corner is the trap I have to pass. "All you have to do is change course", said the cat... and ate it. The first is the "Fireflowers"
title: Una pequeña fábula
author: Franz Kafka
